plurals.name: diff_years
plurals.item: Text indicating that the event occurred two or more years ago.\"%d\" is the number of years.
Text indicating that the event occurred one year ago.

plurals.name: format_reading_list_statistical_detail
plurals.item: Detailed description shown for a reading list that contains multiple articles; The %1$d parameter is the number of pages saved to disk for offline reading, the %2$d parameter is the number of total pages in the list, and the %3$.2f parameter is the total number of megabytes saved to disk for this list.

Detailed description shown for a reading list that contains one article; The %1$d parameter is the number pages saved to disk for offline reading (zero or one), and the %3$.2f parameter is the number of megabytes saved to disk for this list.

plurals.name: format_reading_list_statistical_summary
plurals.item: Summary shown for a reading list that contains multiple articles; The %1$d parameter is the number of pages in the list, and the %2$.2f parameter is the total number of megabytes saved to disk for offline page reading.
Summary shown for a reading list that contains one article. The %2$.2f parameter is replaced with the cache size of the article.

plurals.name: multi_items_selected
plurals.item: Toolbar title shown when the user is selecting multiple items in a list. The \"%d\" symbol is replaced with the number of items currently selected.
Toolbar title shown when the user is selecting multiple items in a list, and one item is currently selected.

plurals.name: notification_archive_message
plurals.item: Message shown when multiple notifications are archived. The %d is replaced with the number of notifications.
Message shown when a single notification is archived.

plurals.name: notification_channel_name
plurals.item: Name of the notification channel that shows the app is downloading two or more articles
Name of the notification channel that shows the app is downloading one article

plurals.name: notification_syncing_description
plurals.item: Text of notification shows the remaining articles. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining articles.
Text of notification shows the remaining article. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining articles.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_channel_name
plurals.item: Name of the notification channel of syncing two or more reading lists
Name of the notification channel of syncing one reading list

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_description
plurals.item: Text of notification shows the remaining lists. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining lists.
Text of notification shows the remaining list. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of remaining lists.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_reading_list_title
plurals.item: Title for notification when the syncing two or more reading lists process begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of lists.
Title for notification when the syncing one reading list process begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of lists.

plurals.name: notification_syncing_title
plurals.item: Title for notification when the downloading process of two or more article begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of articles.
Title for notification when the downloading process of one article begins. The \"%1$d\" symbol corresponds to the amount of articles.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_not_offline_message
plurals.item: Message shown when more than one reading list article is removed from offline availability.
Message shown when a single reading list article is removed from offline availability.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_offline_message
plurals.item: Message shown when more than one reading list article is made available for offline use.
Message shown when a single reading list article is made available for offline use.

plurals.name: reading_list_articles_deleted
plurals.item: Message shown when multiple articles are removed from a reading list. The \"%d\" symbol is replaced with the number of articles removed.
Message shown when one article is removed from a reading list.

plurals.name: search_results_count
plurals.item: Text shown on the list that displays numbers of counts of the result from the search. The \"%d\" symbol is replaced with the amount of the counts.
Text shown on the list that displays one count of the result from the search.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_added_contribution_label
plurals.item: "Text summarizing the user's contribution to the article or image. %d represents the number when many characters are added."
"Text summarizing the user's contribution to the article or image. %d represents the number when only one character is added."

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution
plurals.item: Label text for indicating how many contributions a user has made. For many contributions.
Label text for indicating how many contributions a user has made. For One contribution.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution_count
plurals.item: Text suggesting that two or more in-app contributions were made. %d is the number of contribution.
Text suggesting that one in-app contribution was made.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution_diff_count_text
plurals.item: Label text indicating the number of characters added or removed by a user contribution. %1$s represents the number.
Label text indicating the number of characters added or removed by a user contribution. %1$s represents the number.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution_seen_times
plurals.item: Indicates how many times the contributions have been viewed in the past 30 days. The %s parameter is replaced by the number of views.
Indicates that the contributions have been seen once in the past 30 days.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_edit_streak_detail_text
plurals.item: Label text to show the length of the edit streak in number of days. %d is for many days
Label text to show the length of the edit streak in number of days. %d is for one dat.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_image_tag_contribution_label
plurals.item: "Text summarizing the user's image tag contribution. %d represents the number of tags contributed."
"Text summarizing the user's image tag contribution. %d represents the number of tags contributed."

plurals.name: suggested_edits_rewards_contributions
plurals.item: Message shown about the number of contributions the user has made. The %d parameter represents the number of contrubutions.
Message shown about the number of contributions the user has made.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_rewards_edit_streaks
plurals.item: Message shown about the length of edit streak the user has made. The %1$d parameter represents the length of edit streak and the %2$s parameter represents the user name.
Message shown about the length of edit streak the user has made. The %2$s parameter represents the user name.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_rewards_page_views
plurals.item: Message shown about the pageviews the user has earned in a period of time. The %d represents the number of pageviews.
Message shown about the pageviews the user has earned in a period of time. The %d represents the number of pageviews.

plurals.name: view_continue_reading_card_subtitle
plurals.item: Subtitle for a \"continue reading\" card two or more days old. The first word should have an initial uppercase letter if appropriate for the language. Example: [[phab:F4695814]]. Use the %d parameter to insert the number of days passed since the content (an article) was last seen.
Subtitle for a day old \"continue reading\" card. The word should be in lowercase if appropriate for the language.

plurals.name: wikipedia_languages_remove_dialog_title
plurals.item: Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when two or more items have been selected.
Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when only one item has been selected.
